ygData.subject: Another female loseing her mind.
ygData.msgSnippet: Surgitals flashback was sent into Ices mind, she saw everything as if it was happening to her. It s not happening to me, it s not me. she kept telling

Surgitals flashback was sent into Ices mind, she saw everything as if it wa=
s happening to her. "It's not happening to me, it's not me." she kept telli=
ng herself as blade after blade struck her mental form. Trying desperately =
to control her thoughts she shouted another command. "SEPERATE"

Her owl fo=
rm spun out of control as she hit the ground. Seeing that form cut and beat=
en she transformed to her mutant robot mode. Her bearlike paws covered her =
head as a migrane began to form. She tried to be the good leader but her sa=
nity would soon fade if her mind didn't leave Surgital. 
  ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
  From: Samir Duran 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tu=
esday, October 09, 2001 4:15 PM
  Subject: The Cybers Will Never Rule since=
 Tankor sucks when it comes to spelling and using capitals


  ::Triggerhap=
py/Skullgrin/Jume/Whee/Surgital::
   
  Triggerhappy's finger moved to pull=
 the trigger.  Hell Drak's eyes were closed tight, waiting for death.  But =
nothing happened.  She opened her eyes.  Triggerhappy was hit, and fell to =
his knees, mouth wide open, shocked, and in pain.  
   
  "You....." Trigge=
rhappy stopped to gasped for air, "Pile of......."
   
  Triggerhappy fell =
down on his face, so he was laying on the ground.  Where his face was, a pu=
ddle of mechfluid appeared, and mechfluids started spilling from where he h=
ad been hit.  The punctures in his metal started to turn into cracks, and m=
echfluid came out.
   
  Skullgrin, Jume, and Whee watched as Triggerhappy =
had been supposedly defeated.
   
  "NO!  MY DECEPTIPAL!" Skullgrin shouted=
.
   
  Skullgrin transformed into Pretender mode, and had his massive, fre=
aky club.  He ran at AzureBlade and threw a lethal blow to AzureBlade's hea=
d.  Jume and Whee fired at AzureBlade.
   
  "No!  Watch out!" Hell Drak ye=
lled.
   
  A light came into her optics, and then she quickly got up and d=
ove at AzureBlade, trying to take him down, but out of the way of damage...=

  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Surgital suddenly felt something from Ice.  The mind t=
hing.  Pain.  
   
  "No........not this.......I thought I had forgot about=
 this!" Surgital said, but which Bodicon was saying it, nobody knew.
   
  =
Surgital didn't feel physical pain, but a flashback showed up, and would be=
 visible in the minds of both Ice and all the Bodicons.  It was a flashback=
 from Decapitron!  
   
  Flashback:  Decapitron was tied to a conveyer bel=
t, with some sort of energon rope.  He was horrified, and was screaming for=
 help.  Then, he went forward, and a bunch of saws and stuff came down!  Th=
ey started cutting at Decapitron.  All he could do was scream in sheer pain=
.  Each saw blade had the Autobot symbol engraved on it.  Decapitron, still=
 tied onto the conveyer belt, was now heading into a large box thing.  On t=
he way, a heavy thing with an Autobot symbol came down and sort of crushed =
Decapitron's head.  Then, Decapitron went into the box thing, which also ha=
d an Autobot symbol, and then the doors of the box shut, and then Decapitro=
n was stuck, and he was getting beaten and battered.  After the 10 minute t=
orture process was done in the box, Decapitron kept going.  Mechfluid and o=
il and stuff were pouring like mad, and he was mangled and dislocated and s=
tuff.  Finally, he was at the end, and was dumped off of the conveyer belt =
and onto the ground.  The last thing he had seen back then when that happen=
ed, was Autobots around him, laughing sinisterly with evil eyes and faces. =
 
  *Flashback Ends*
   
  Surgital was still...

nsor
